titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: NHS Continuing Healthcare Fast Track Pathway Tool - Description

div.p: A NHS Continuing Healthcare Fast Track Pathway Tool is an ASSESSMENT TOOL.

A NHS Continuing Healthcare Fast Track Pathway Tool is used when a CARE PROFESSIONAL considers that a PERSON should be fast tracked for NHS Continuing Healthcare because that PERSON has a rapidly deteriorating condition and the condition may be entering a terminal phase.

For further information on the NHS Continuing Healthcare Fast Track Pathway Tool, see the Department of Health and Social Care part of the gov.uk website at: National framework for NHS continuing healthcare and NHS funded nursing care.
